content: lion brand pattern # 70144a skill level beginner level 1 vanna s choice® article #860 12 colors 13 balls total *chocolate linen mustard dusty purple brick purple dusty blue olive dusty rose pea green antique rose rust* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm work 2 squares in each color 24 total in half_double_crochet u s squares are about 8 x 8 arrange squares as shown in assembly diagram 4 across x 6 down sew together crochet edging to finish
